name: 12th International Conference on Data Mining & Knowledge Management Process
content: 12th International Conference on Data Mining & Knowledge Management Process (DKMP 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Data Mining and knowledge management process. The goal of this conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding Modern data mining concepts and establishing new collaborations in these areas. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the areas of Data Mining & Knowledge Management Process.
